name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Junko Enoshima Pack
summary:
A mod that adds the Ultimate Despair civilization with its Leader Junko Enoshima.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique district (Reserve Course)
- Unique spy unit (77-B Class)
- Unique city project (The Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy)
- Unique system of evangelizing beliefs (Despair)
- Changes the values of loyalty pressure for everyone on the match
- And much more!
